EntryName	PRPS3_HUMAN
ProteinName	Ribose-phosphate pyrophosphokinase 3 (EC 2.7.6.1) (Phosphoribosyl pyrophosphate synthase 1-like 1) (PRPS1-like 1) (Phosphoribosyl pyrophosphate synthase III) (PRS-III)
GeneName	PRPS1L1 PRPS3 PRPSL
Length	318
Function	Catalyzes the synthesis of phosphoribosylpyrophosphate (PRPP) that is essential for nucleotide synthesis.
